name: Futurol
description:
-Your goal is to reach the win tile. 

-Each tile can be stepped on only once. 

-The dice has 3 faces, three, four and five. 

-The number of steps taken to reach the win tile, must be a multiple of the side facing up on the win tile.

By G Prabhanjana (@prabhanjana_) and Warren Andress (LambdaPyro)
